description: Works to exterior including: render and paint front of house; repair and restore plaster work to front of house; repair and restore metalwork on balconies and garden to front of house. Internal works including: at LGF; removal of modern floorboards (retention of original floorboards), installation of underfloor heating and installation of wood floor. At GROUND FLOOR, removal of modern floorboards (retention of original floorboards), installation of underfloor heating and installation of new limestone floor throughout parts of ground floor, retaining existing height of floor level. Reinstatement of original hallway/dining room wall with doorway. Removal of  non-original doorway from hallway to stairwell, and open up to original design (removed door to be used for new entrance into dining room). Installation of 1no. new ceiling rose in dining room. Removal of modern doors from kitchen into conservatory retaining original brickwork frame. STAIRWELL Removal of non-original newel post at foot of stairs and replacement with traditional curved design. Repair and restore original metal stair rail down to LGF. Installation of skirting down staircase to LGF (to match design of rest of stairwell). 1ST FLOOR Installation of cornice (taking mould from ground floor stairwell) on same footprint as 1st floor stairwell cornice. Installation of 2no. new ceiling roses in living room. Removal of modern floorboards (retention of original floorboards) and installation of underfloor heating. Installation of new parquet engineered wooden floorboards throughout living room retaining existing height of floor level. Restore and repair damaged cornice in far corner of living room. 2ND FLOOR, installation of cornice (simplified version of ground floor cornice) on same footprint as 1st floor stairwell cornice removal of modern floorboards (retention of original floorboards), installation of underfloor heating and installation of new parquet engineered wooden floorboards throughout master bedroom retaining existing height of floor level.
